markdownRemark.html:
This is a quick and easy recipe using pre-made ramen packets but adding in vegetables and tofu

Ingredients

Vegetables

  • Onion
  • Garlic
  • Ginger
  • Chestnut mushrooms

Sauces/Stock

  • Stock included in ramen packet

Starch

  • Ramen noodles

Seasoning

  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh chilli pepper if spice is desired
